title: Check Agent's License Status
description: A brokerage manager needs to verify that all agents in the office have renewed their real estate licenses and completed their continuing education.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all agents affiliated with the brokerage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a complete roster of licensed agents.

tasks.description: For each agent, search the state's real estate commission license lookup portal.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager checks each agent's license status on the official state website.

tasks.description: Identify any agents with expired licenses or upcoming renewal dates and send them a reminder.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager finds one agent whose license expires next month and sends them a reminder notice.
